submapp.som.Som¶

class submapp.som.Som(n: int, m: int, variables: list, p: int = 1, distance_matrix: numpy.ndarray = None, weights: numpy.ndarray = None, name: str = 'MySom', data_mean: numpy.ndarray = array([0]), data_stdev: numpy.ndarray = array([1]))¶

Self-Organizing Map (or Kohonen Map)

Here is a quick summary of the purpose of every attribute and method. (Note that some of them may appear in several rows)

Shape of the SOM

n, m, nb_class, p, shape, location_classes, distance_matrix

Data processing

data_mean, data_stdev, standardize, destandardize

Training

train, nb_training_iterations, relerr_train, is_trained

Mapping

map, nb_inputs_mapped, class2weights, clear_map_info

Testing

weights, occ_bmu_map, weights_features, time_info, transition, distance_transitions, print_heatmap, print_weights_pca_axis, relerr_test
Variables

name (str) – The Name of the Som object. This name has no impact on the variable name, however it can be usefull when it comes to saving the Som object and its related figures, defaults to “MySom”

Attributes¶

Som.data_mean

Mean of the training data

Som.data_stdev

Standard deviation of the training data

Som.distance_matrix

Matrix of relative distance between each class

Som.distance_transitions

Vector of distance between consecutive BMU mapped by the SOM

Som.is_trained

Indicate whether the training phase is completed.

Som.m

The number of columns of the SOM

Som.n

The number of rows of the SOM

Som.nb_class

The total number of classes of the SOM (n*m)

Som.nb_inputs_mapped

Total number of vectors mapped by the SOM

Som.nb_missing_transitions

Number of transitions missed due to missing vectors

Som.nb_training_iterations

Total number of vectors used to train the SOM

Som.occ_bmu_map

Occurence of each class as BMU during the mapping phase

Som.p

The size of input vectors (and of the weights too)

Som.relerr_test

Relative error during the mapping phase

Som.relerr_train

Relative error during the training phase

Som.shape

The shape of the SOM (n,m,p)

Som.time_info

For each class, info about the instants t at which it has been used

Som.transition

Matrix of occurence of the transition mapped by the SOM

Som.weights

Weights (i.e referent vectors) of the SOM

Methods¶

Som.__init__

Class constructor

Som.class2weights

Matrix of referent vectors associated to the given classes

Som.clear_map_info

Clear all data related to the mapping phase

Som.destandardize

Multiply by Som.data_stdev and add Som.data_mean

Som.location_classes

Locate classes within the SOM: give their corresponding indexes (i,j)

Som.map

Map data onto the SOM

Som.pca_weights_initialization

Initialize weights with a PCA of the training data

Som.print_heatmap

Print the heatmap describing a feature of the classes

Som.print_weights_pca_axis

Print the weights of the map on first two axis of the PCA

Som.random_weights_initialization

Initialize weights randomly

Som.sample_weights_initialization

Initialize weights with a sample of the training data

Som.standardize

Substact Som.data_mean and divide by Som.data_stdev

Som.train

Train the SOM (ie update the weights) provided training data.

Som.weights_features

Extract some features from the weights

Som.zeros_weights_initialization

Initialize all weights to zeros vectors
